rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {AZA4111, AZA4311, AZA4718, AZA4740, AZA4778, AZA4808}
Unit was previously coded {AZA4312, AZA4741, AZA4809}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS4779, AZA4312, AZA4741, AZA4809}

description: Under the guidance of an allocated supervisor, students will complete a research dissertation. The research dissertation will be based on the approved proposal done in the first semester.. Students will meet with their supervisor on a regular basis and will be required to submit bi-monthly reports on dissertation related writing assignments.
